source_name: 闔家歡親子奇幻魔術秀《魔法時刻》- 深圳站
source_address: 深圳市羅湖區伯大尼博物館
source_introduction: 闔家歡親子奇幻魔術秀《魔法時刻》是一場專為家庭和兒童設計的奇幻魔術表演，融合了創意魔術與親子互動環節。活動地點位於深圳羅湖區伯大尼博物館，讓家庭觀眾享受一場充滿驚喜與歡笑的魔法體驗。演出包含現場魔術、大型視覺效果及互動遊戲，適合所有年齡層，提升親子間的歡樂時光。
enrich_localName: 闔家歡親子奇幻魔術秀《魔法時刻》- 深圳站
enrich_englishName: Family-Friendly Fantasy Magic Show ‘Magic Moment’ - Shenzhen
enrich_textEmbedding: 闔家歡親子奇幻魔術秀《魔法時刻》在深圳羅湖區伯大尼博物館舉行，提供創意魔術與親子互動，適合全家共享奇幻與歡樂時光，演出融合大型視覺效果和遊戲元素，是一場融合文化與娛樂的精彩家庭活動。
enrich_description: 深圳羅湖區伯大尼博物館舉辦的親子奇幻魔術秀，適合全家共享歡樂時光。
cityline_name: 闔家歡親子奇幻魔術秀《魔法時刻》- 深圳站

source_name: 伯大尼博物館 導賞團 (2025年8月)
source_address: 香港薄扶林薄扶林道139號
source_introduction: 伯大尼博物館位於香港薄扶林伯大尼修院，屬香港法定古蹟及演藝學院校園，擁有逾百年歷史，融合法式哥德建築風格與本地文化。參觀者可預約參與不定期舉辦的導賞團，深入探索修道院教堂、博物館展覽及地下酒窖，了解傳教士歷史、中法文化交融，以及洋紫荊發現與栽培的故事。導賞團需提前於Cityline預約，場次有限且經常售罄，建議提早規劃。活動適合對歷史、建築、藝術及文化有興趣人士參與，並有機會了解香港演藝學院在此地的發展與貢獻。
enrich_localName: 伯大尼博物館 導賞團 (2025年8月)
enrich_englishName: Bethanie Museum Guided Tour (August 2025)
enrich_textEmbedding: 伯大尼博物館導賞團帶你深入逾百年歷史的伯大尼修院，探索法式哥德建築、博物館展覽與地下酒窖，了解傳教士歷史、中法文化交融及洋紫荊發現故事。活動由香港演藝學院主辦，需提前預約，適合歷史、建築、藝術愛好者。
enrich_description: 深入百年法式古蹟，探索歷史、建築與文化的獨特體驗。
cityline_name: 伯大尼博物館 (2025年8月)

source_name: 前衛正：時光旅人
source_address: 西九文化區M+博物館, 九龍尖沙咀柯士甸道西8號, 香港
source_introduction: 《前衛正：時光旅人》為M+戲院2025年夏季節目之一，邀請四位當代藝術家與導演——莫妮拉阿爾卡迪里、曹斐、小泉明郎及蘇巴什特貝林布——以科幻、奇幻與文化元素為軸，打造出一系列對未來的視覺想像與藝術體驗。活動透過影片、裝置及多媒體呈現，探索時間如何形塑視覺表達與文化敘事，邀請觀眾參與一場穿越時空的視覺旅程[1][5]。
enrich_localName: 前衛正：時光旅人
enrich_englishName: Avant-Garde Right: Time Traveler
enrich_textEmbedding: 《前衛正：時光旅人》於香港西九文化區M+博物館舉行，呈現四位國際藝術家的原創作品，巧妙融合科幻、奇幻與文化元素，帶領觀眾穿梭於多重時空，體驗未來視覺藝術與文化敘事的新維度。活動以跨媒介方式展示影像、裝置與表演，為本地文化盛事增添不凡色彩[1][5]。
enrich_description: 跨界藝術展賞，體驗科幻、奇幻與文化交織的未來時空之旅。
cityline_name: 前衛正：時間旅人

source_name: M+戲院夏季節目：電影《搞鬼小築》特別放映
source_address: 西九文化區, 香港
source_introduction: 「搞鬼小築」是一部由三池崇史於2001年執導的電影，2025年夏季期間，西九文化區M+戲院以罕有的35毫米菲林格式舉行特別放映，作為其夏季節目的一部分。該節目還包括其他奇洛李維斯的經典作品回顧與東盟電影節，呈現豐富多元的電影文化體驗，讓觀眾沉浸於創意且獨特的視聽享受。
enrich_localName: 搞鬼小築 特別放映 西九文化區 M+戲院 夏季節目
enrich_englishName: The Happiness of the Katakuris Special Screening at M+ Cinema, West Kowloon Cultural District
enrich_textEmbedding: The Happiness of the Katakuris, a 2001 film by Takashi Miike, is specially screened in 35mm film format at the M+ Cinema in West Kowloon Cultural District as part of the 2025 summer program featuring Keanu Reeves' classics and ASEAN film festival. It offers a unique cultural film experience combining rare film format viewing and diverse cinematic showcases.
enrich_description: Special 35mm film screening of The Happiness of the Katakuris at M+ Cinema, West Kowloon.
cityline_name: 搞鬼小築

source_name: 綠藝心活——持續與自然共樂
source_address: 西九文化區藝術公園, 西九龍, 香港
source_introduction: 綠藝心活——持續與自然共樂是一個於2025年8月至2026年2月在西九文化區藝術公園舉行的戶外活動，結合教育、可持續發展及藝術，透過寓學習於娛樂的戶外旅程，引導參與者體驗與自然共生的生活理念，活動包括藝術裝置、互動體驗和自然探索，旨在提升公眾的環保意識及享受自然樂趣。
enrich_localName: 綠藝心活──持續與自然共樂
enrich_englishName: Mindful Nature – Sustainable Harmony with Nature
enrich_textEmbedding: Mindful Nature – Sustainable Harmony with Nature is an outdoor art and education event held at West Kowloon Art Park from August 2025 to February 2026. It integrates sustainability, environmental education, and art to engage visitors in interactive experiences promoting harmony with nature through art installations and nature exploration.
enrich_description: Engaging outdoor event blending art, nature, and sustainability at West Kowloon Art Park.
cityline_name: 綠藝心活——持續與自然共樂

source_name: 深圳吴春燕《四大名著》影视金曲交响音乐会
source_address: 深圳南山文体中心聚橙剧院大剧院
source_introduction: 吳春燕《四大名著》影视金曲交响音乐会在深圳南山文体中心聚橙剧院大剧院举行。这场音乐会汇集了《红楼梦》、《水浒传》、《西游记》和《三国演义》的经典影视金曲，呈现出一种独特的文化和艺术体验，适合所有爱好音乐和经典四大名著的人士。音乐会将于2025年7月27日晚上20:00开始，门票价格从80元起。
enrich_localName: 吳春燕《四大名著》影視金曲交響音樂會
enrich_englishName: Wu Chunyan's Four Great Classical Literary Works Concert
enrich_textEmbedding: Experience the grandeur of Wu Chunyan's《四大名著》shadow image concert in Shenzhen's Nanshan Cultural Center. This concert showcases timeless classics from 'Dream of the Red Chamber', 'Water Margin', 'Journey to the West', and 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms'. Enjoy a unique blend of cultural heritage and musical artistry.
enrich_description: Classical concert featuring iconic themes from four great novels.
cityline_name: 吳春燕 -《四大名著》影視金曲交響音樂會-深圳站

source_name: 自由空間大盒
source_address: 九龍西九文化區藝術公園自由空間
source_introduction: 自由空間是位於西九文化區藝術公園中心的多功能藝術表演場所，其中「大盒」是全港最大的黑盒劇場，設有424個座位，適合舉行實驗劇場、舞蹈、多媒體表演、音樂會及展覽等中小型表演活動。空間並配備優質隔音設施，成為本地及國際藝術團體交流與創新的重要場地。
enrich_localName: 自由空間大盒
enrich_englishName: Freespace - The Big Box
enrich_textEmbedding: 自由空間大盒位於西九文化區藝術公園中央，是香港最大的黑盒劇場，擁有424個座位，適合實驗劇場、舞蹈、多媒體及音樂等多種表演形式，是本地及國際藝術家的交流平台，提供多元化的藝術表演和活動體驗。
enrich_description: 香港最大黑盒劇場，提供多元實驗及創意表演空間。
cityline_name: 《黑盒音樂》

source_introduction: 第十屆小橙堡國際親子藝術節在深圳南山文體中心劇院舉辦，呈現來自法國的歡樂小丑秀《小醜嘉年華》。此次活動融合幽默、互動與多元藝術元素，特別適合親子家庭觀賞。表演以小丑的精彩搞笑表演與互動環節，帶給兒童及大人歡樂與啟發，同時促進親子間的情感交流和藝術啟蒙。

enrich_textEmbedding: The 10th Little Orange Castle International Family Arts Festival presents the French Happy Clown Show 'Clown Carnival' in Shenzhen's Nanshan Cultural Center Theater. This lively performance blends humor, interaction, and diverse art forms, ideal for families and children. It offers engaging clown acts promoting joy, creativity, and parent-child bonding through cultural and artistic experiences.

source_name: 《民樂映九州｜ “長歌遊燕趙”民族音樂會》—河北民族樂團-深圳站
source_address: 深圳市南山區南山文體中心聚橙劇院小劇院，南山大道南頭街62號
source_introduction: 《民樂映九州｜ “長歌遊燕趙”民族音樂會》由河北省歌舞劇院民族樂團主辦，於2025年7月27日在深圳南山文體中心聚橙劇院小劇院舉行。音樂會展示了豐富多彩的中國民族音樂，以河北燕趙文化為主題，融合多種傳統民樂元素，帶來獨特的聽覺體驗。演出時長約90分鐘，票價起始80元人民幣。
source_Categories: 文化,音樂會,民族音樂,文藝演出
enrich_localName: 《民樂映九州｜ “長歌遊燕趙”民族音樂會》—河北民族樂團-深圳站
enrich_englishName: Folk Music Reflecting Jiuzhou | 'Long Song Touring Yanzhao' Ethnic Music Concert - Hebei National Orchestra Shenzhen Stop
enrich_textEmbedding: 《民樂映九州｜ “長歌遊燕趙”民族音樂會》由河北省歌舞劇院民族樂團於2025年7月27日在深圳南山文體中心聚橙劇院小劇院演出，展現豐富的中國民族音樂與燕趙文化，帶來約90分鐘的視聽盛宴，適合喜愛文化藝術的觀眾體驗。
enrich_description: 河北民族樂團呈獻，燕趙文化民族音樂盛會，探索中國音樂之美。

source_name: 舞劇《人在花間住》深圳站 - 國家藝術基金專案舞劇
source_address: 深圳市南山區文體中心聚橙劇院大劇院
source_introduction: 舞劇《人在花間住》聚焦阿尔茨海默症患者，以岭南文化和广东音乐为背景，通过舞蹈展现母子情深与日常生活的温情。本剧由国家艺术基金支持，是一次融合现实主义题材与艺术美学的创新表达，展现岭南人对花的热爱与生活审美，演出地点为深圳南山文体中心聚橙剧院大剧院，2025年7月25日至26日上演，门票火热销售中。
enrich_localName: 舞劇《人在花間住》深圳站 - 國家藝術基金專案舞劇
enrich_englishName: Dance Drama "Living Among Flowers" Shenzhen Station - National Arts Fund Project
enrich_textEmbedding: 舞劇《人在花間住》於2025年7月25日至26日在深圳南山文體中心聚橙劇院大劇院盛大上演。該劇聚焦阿尔茨海默症患者，以岭南文化為背景，通過舞蹈演繹母子情感與日常生活的真情，融合現實主義題材和藝術美學，是國家藝術基金支持的重要項目，為觀眾呈現一場充滿愛與美的文化藝術盛宴。
enrich_description: 深圳聚橙劇院呈現關注阿爾茨海默症的現實主義舞劇，詮釋母子情感與岭南生活。
cityline_name: 【舞是%舞蹈藝術節】國家藝術基金專案 舞劇《人在花間住》- 深圳站

source_name: 西九文化區x 綠葉劇團：《山海經》第一部曲──山川命．終章
source_address: 香港九龍西九文化區自由空間大盒, 1號西九文化區中心道
source_introduction: 《山海經》第一部曲──山川命・終章是由西九文化區與綠葉劇團聯合主辦及製作的舞台劇作品，融合形體表演、戲曲和紙藝紮作元素，重塑中國古代奇書《山海經》的神話世界，帶領觀眾探索天地創世及奇幻生物傳說。節目於西九文化區自由空間大盒上演，是西九創作人系列的重點劇目之一，展現中西合璧的藝術風貌和肢體語言的敘事力，讓觀眾見證原始奇幻與文化傳承的結合。
enrich_localName: 西九文化區x 綠葉劇團：《山海經》第一部曲──山川命．終章
enrich_englishName: West Kowloon Cultural District x Green Leaf Theatre: Classic of Mountains and Seas Part One – The Command of Mountains and Rivers Finale
enrich_textEmbedding: 西九文化區與綠葉劇團合作呈獻《山海經》第一部曲──山川命．終章，融合肢體表演、戲曲與紙藝紮作元素，重塑中國先秦神話奇書《山海經》的創世故事和奇珍異獸傳說。本劇於西九文化區自由空間大盒上演，是展現中西傳統藝術結合與劇場美學的階段展演，邀請觀眾一同探索天地創始的神秘與奇幻，堪稱本地劇場的藝術盛事。
enrich_description: 創意肢體與戲曲融合，探索《山海經》神話故事的現代舞台劇盛事。
cityline_name: 西九文化區 x 綠葉劇團：《山海經》第一部曲──山川命．終章

source_name: 黃雅華芭蕾舞學校40週年-小飛俠
source_address: 中環海濱活動空間, 香港中環
source_introduction: 黃雅華芭蕾舞學校舉辦40週年紀念演出，以經典芭蕾舞劇《小飛俠》為主題，演出於香港市中心的中環海濱活動空間舉行，展現學生們多年來的學習成果與藝術表現力。活動適合家長帶同子女一同觀賞，享受精彩的芭蕾舞表演，親身體驗文化藝術氛圍。
enrich_localName: 黃雅華芭蕾舞學校40週年-小飛俠
enrich_englishName: Wong Nga Wa Ballet School 40th Anniversary - Peter Pan
enrich_textEmbedding: Celebrating 40 years of Wong Nga Wa Ballet School, this special anniversary event features a performance of the classic ballet 'Peter Pan' at the Central Harbourfront Event Space in Hong Kong. The show highlights the talents of students and the school's dedication to ballet education, offering a cultural experience for families and art enthusiasts.
enrich_description: 經典芭蕾舞劇《小飛俠》慶祝黃雅華芭蕾舞學校40週年，適合親子同樂。
cityline_name: 黃雅華芭蕾舞學校40週年-小飛俠

source_name: 哥伦比亚狂想——博特罗艺术大展
source_address: 广东省广州市越秀区白鹅潭南岸广东美术馆白鹅潭馆区
source_introduction: “哥伦比亚狂想——博特罗艺术大展”于2025年7月10日在广东美术馆白鹅潭馆区开幕，展出哥伦比亚国宝级艺术家费尔南多·博特罗极具代表性的80余件作品，涵盖油画、雕塑和纸本等多种媒介形式，首次在粤港澳大湾区重要呈现博特罗艺术，体现其标志性的夸张美学风格，是一次难得的深度文化艺术体验。
enrich_localName: 哥伦比亚狂想——博特罗艺术大展
enrich_englishName: Colombian Rhapsody - Botero Art Exhibition
enrich_textEmbedding: The Colombian Rhapsody - Botero Art Exhibition is held at Guangdong Museum of Art, presenting over 80 iconic works by Colombian master Fernando Botero including paintings, sculptures, and paper media. This is Botero's first major show in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, showcasing his characteristic exaggerated aesthetic style. It offers a unique cultural experience in Guangzhou's Yuexiu District.
enrich_description: Exhibition of over 80 iconic Botero works, showcasing Colombian exaggerated aesthetics in Guangzhou.
cityline_name: 哥倫比亞狂想-博特羅藝術大展‧廣州

source_name: 龍婷《旅程》巡迴音樂會 2025 香港站
source_address: 香港西九龍西九文化區博物館道18號
source_introduction: 龍婷《旅程》巡迴音樂會2025香港站將於2025年8月18日至20日在西九文化區自由空間大盒舉行。音樂會包括龍婷的新歌及經典曲目，通過音樂拼湊成一個又一個故事，講述她的過去、現在和未來，與粉絲近距離分享她的音樂旅程。票價有兩種選擇：VIP票$1080（含彩排環節及即影即有合照）和普通票$880。6歲以下兒童謝絕入場。
enrich_localName: 龍婷《旅程》巡迴音樂會 2025 香港站
enrich_englishName: Stacey Long Journey Tour Concert 2025 Hong Kong Stop
enrich_textEmbedding: The Stacey Long Journey Tour Concert 2025 Hong Kong Stop is held from August 18 to 20 at West Kowloon Cultural District FreeSpace Big Box, featuring new and classic songs that tell Stacey's past, present, and future stories. Tickets offer access to live music experiences with VIP options including rehearsal viewing and photo opportunities.
enrich_description: Experience intimate live music stories by Stacey Long at West Kowloon’s FreeSpace Big Box.
cityline_name: 龍婷 旅程 巡迴音樂會 香港站

source_name: FunkyTown Dance Studio “Back To Basics” Dance Showcase 2025
source_address: Southorn Stadium, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
source_introduction: FunkyTown Dance Studio presents its annual “Back To Basics” Dance Showcase 2025, celebrating the 10th anniversary collaboration with Funky Heroes. This lively dance event features a variety of styles and performances by students and professionals alike, highlighting the fundamentals of urban dance culture. Held at Wan Chai's Southorn Stadium, the showcase is a community-focused event emphasizing dance education, artistry, and entertainment.
enrich_localName: FunkyTown Dance Studio「回歸基礎」舞蹈展演2025
enrich_englishName: FunkyTown Dance Studio “Back To Basics” Dance Showcase 2025
enrich_textEmbedding: FunkyTown Dance Studio’s “Back To Basics” Dance Showcase 2025 is an annual event at Wan Chai’s Southorn Stadium, celebrating foundational urban dance culture. This 10th anniversary collaboration with Funky Heroes features diverse performances focusing on dance fundamentals, community engagement, and artistic expression, attracting dance enthusiasts from Hong Kong and beyond.
enrich_description: Annual urban dance showcase celebrating foundational styles and community artistry in Wan Chai.
cityline_name: FunkyTown Dance Studio “Back To Basics” Dance Showcase 2025

source_name: G-DRAGON 2025 World Tour [Übermensch] IN HONG KONG, presented by HSBC Life - AsiaWorld-Expo Arena Concert
source_address: 1 Expo Drive, AsiaWorld-Expo, Lantau Island, Hong Kong
source_introduction: G-DRAGON, the iconic South Korean rapper, singer-songwriter, and fashion innovator, is bringing his 2025 World Tour [Übermensch] to Hong Kong's AsiaWorld-Expo Arena. This highly anticipated concert event spans two days on August 9 and 10, 2025, featuring performances from his critically acclaimed third studio album 'Übermensch.' Presented by HSBC Life, the tour showcases G-DRAGON's dynamic music, stage presence, and groundbreaking artistic vision, offering fans an immersive entertainment experience.
enrich_localName: G-DRAGON 2025 世界巡迴演唱會 [Übermensch] 香港站 - 由匯豐人壽呈獻 亞洲國際博覽館Arena 演唱會
enrich_englishName: G-DRAGON 2025 World Tour [Übermensch] in Hong Kong, presented by HSBC Life at AsiaWorld-Expo Arena
enrich_textEmbedding: Experience the G-DRAGON 2025 World Tour [Übermensch] live in Hong Kong at AsiaWorld-Expo Arena on August 9-10, 2025. Presented by HSBC Life, the concert highlights G-DRAGON's artistic innovation and his latest album 'Übermensch,' promising an unforgettable K-pop live music event with cutting-edge performances and iconic stage design.
enrich_description: Catch G-DRAGON's electrifying 2025 World Tour live in Hong Kong at AsiaWorld-Expo Arena.
cityline_name: G-DRAGON 2025 World Tour [Übermensch] IN HONG KONG, presented by HSBC Life

source_name: 楊麗萍作品《平潭映象》香港站
source_address: Hong Kong West Kowloon Cultural District, Xiqu Centre Grand Theatre, Hong Kong
source_introduction: 《平潭映象》是由著名舞蹈家楊麗萍導演的舞台劇，以海為幕、以島為魂，融合中國傳統民俗文化與海洋題材，通過神話故事展現兩岸人文與自然景觀。本劇以東方美學為核心，運用現代舞台技術與傳統藝術表現手法，呈現一場視覺與聽覺的盛宴。本次香港站特別選址西九文化區戲曲中心大劇院，為本港觀眾帶來別開生面的文化體驗。演出全長約120分鐘，無中場休息。
enrich_localName: 楊麗萍作品《平潭映象》| 西九文化區戲曲中心大劇院
enrich_englishName: Yang Liping's 'Impression of Pingtan' | Xiqu Centre Grand Theatre, West Kowloon Cultural District
enrich_textEmbedding: Yang Liping’s 'Impression of Pingtan' is a grand theatre production that masterfully blends traditional Chinese folklore with marine themes, set against a mythic narrative. Renowned for its striking visual aesthetics and dynamic choreography, the show presents an immersive experience of Eastern culture. The Hong Kong stop will be held at the Xiqu Centre Grand Theatre in the West Kowloon Cultural District, making it a highlight for local arts and culture enthusiasts seeking a unique, visually stunning performance.
enrich_description: A visually captivating stage production blending Chinese folklore and marine themes by Yang Liping, performed at Xiqu Centre.
cityline_name: 舞台劇《平潭映象》

source_name: 情熱夏日：芭蕾家庭同樂日
source_address: 香港九龍紅磡黃埔花園道10號 香港演藝學院四樓一號舞蹈排練室
source_introduction: 情熱夏日：芭蕾家庭同樂日於2025年8月1日下午2:30及4:30在香港演藝學院四樓一號舞蹈排練室舉行，演出約1小時無中場休息。節目包括香港芭蕾舞團多部備受喜愛的經典舞劇選段，如《睡美人》及《羅密歐＋茱麗葉》，現場由港芭鋼琴師劉智聰伴奏。演出後設有互動芭蕾工作坊，參與者可學習芭蕾舞動作、近距離欣賞芭蕾舞服裝，及親手製作芭蕾主題紀念品，適合大小朋友，共享親子芭蕾藝術體驗。
enrich_localName: 情熱夏日：芭蕾家庭同樂日
enrich_englishName: Summer Fling: Ballet Family Fun Day
enrich_textEmbedding: Summer Fling: Ballet Family Fun Day is an engaging cultural event held at the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts featuring beloved ballet excerpts such as Sleeping Beauty and Romeo + Juliet. With live piano accompaniment and an interactive ballet workshop, this event invites families and ballet lovers to discover the vibrant, charming world of ballet in an intimate setting.
enrich_description: A lively ballet performance and interactive family workshop celebrating summer with classic dance highlights.
cityline_name: 情熱夏日: 芭蕾家庭同樂日

source_name: SEKAI NO OWARI ASIA TOUR 2025「Phoenix」in Hong Kong
source_address: AsiaWorld-Expo, 1 Expo Dr, Chek Lap Kok, Lantau Island, Hong Kong
source_introduction: SEKAI NO OWARI, the popular Japanese band, will perform in Hong Kong as part of their Asia Tour 2025 "Phoenix" at AsiaWorld-Expo Hall 10 on September 30, 2025 at 8 PM. This is their first HK concert in six years, featuring a blend of J-pop, rock, and electronic music with cinematic visuals and immersive staging. Tickets went on pre-sale for HSBC Mastercard holders starting July 7, 2025. The concert is organized by Live Nation and offers standing tickets priced at HKD 799 and HKD 999.
enrich_localName: SEKAI NO OWARI 亞洲巡迴演唱會 2025 「Phoenix」香港站
enrich_englishName: SEKAI NO OWARI ASIA TOUR 2025 "Phoenix" in Hong Kong
enrich_textEmbedding: SEKAI NO OWARI returns to Hong Kong for their Asia Tour 2025 "Phoenix" with a concert at AsiaWorld-Expo Hall 10 on September 30, 2025. The Japanese band offers a spectacular live show with emotional ballads, energetic anthems, and theatrical staging. Tickets were available first via HSBC Mastercard presale, followed by Live Nation members and general sales. This event marks the band’s first HK performance in six years, promising an unforgettable music experience.
enrich_description: Experience SEKAI NO OWARI's cinematic live concert in Hong Kong, part of their 2025 Phoenix Asia Tour.
cityline_name: 滙豐Mastercard信用卡優先預售門票: SEKAI NO OWARI ASIA TOUR 2025 「Phoenix」 in HONG KONG

source_name: 西九文化區X 香港中樂團：樂在茶時- 夏
source_address: 戲曲中心 茶館劇場, 西九文化區, 九龍, 香港
source_introduction: 「樂在茶時－夏」是由西九文化區與香港中樂團合辦的文化活動，於戲曲中心茶館劇場舉行，結合中樂演奏與茶道文化，分別設有英語及粵語場次，為觀眾呈獻獨特的音樂與茶文化體驗。
enrich_localName: 西九文化區X 香港中樂團：樂在茶時－夏
enrich_englishName: West Kowloon Cultural District x Hong Kong Chinese Orchestra: Chinese Tea and Music – Summer
enrich_textEmbedding: 西九文化區與香港中樂團合作的「樂在茶時－夏」活動，於2025年8月7日在戲曲中心茶館劇場舉行。活動結合中樂演奏和茶道文化，有英語及粵語場次，讓參與者享受夏日茶時的文化盛宴，體驗地域特色音樂與傳統茶文化的融合。
enrich_description: Summer cultural event blending Chinese orchestral music and tea culture at West Kowloon.
cityline_name: 西九文化區x香港中樂團：樂在茶時 – 夏

source_name: 西九夜延場
source_address: 西九文化區戲曲中心茶館劇場
source_introduction: 西九文化區於2025年5月起推出全新卡巴萊（Cabaret）節目系列「西九夜延場」，每月精選兩至三個平日晚上在戲曲中心茶館劇場上演。節目匯聚多種原創表演，融合音樂、音樂劇場、音樂喜劇及劇場元素，由不同風格的新晉與資深藝術家同臺演出。每場演出均在茶館劇場的獨特空間中，以跨界形式打破傳統表演框架，為觀眾帶來互動、現場感強烈的觀演體驗。適合對文化藝術、現場音樂及跨界娛樂有興趣的觀眾。門票可於Cityline及art-mate購票通購買，全日制學生、60歲或以上高齡人士等部分觀眾可享半價優惠[1][2][3]。
enrich_localName: 西九夜延場
enrich_englishName: West Kowloon Cabaret Nights
enrich_textEmbedding: Cabaret Nights at West Kowloon Cultural District's Xiqu Centre Tea House Theatre offer a unique blend of live music, musical theatre, and comedy in an intimate and immersive setting. Each evening features original, boundary-crossing performances by both emerging and established artists. The program runs select nights from May to July 2025, delivering an engaging cultural experience that celebrates Hong Kong's multicultural artistic scene.
enrich_description: 跨界卡巴萊演出，新舊藝術家同台，融合音樂、戲劇與現場互動。
cityline_name: 西九夜延場

source_name: 2025 NCT DREAM TOUR <THE DREAM SHOW 4 : DREAM THE FUTURE> in HONG KONG
source_address: Kai Tak Stadium, 18 Muk Chui Street, Kai Tak, Kowloon, Hong Kong
source_introduction: The 2025 NCT DREAM TOUR <THE DREAM SHOW 4 : DREAM THE FUTURE> live concert event will be held on August 30, 2025, at Kai Tak Stadium in Hong Kong. The show starts at 6:30 PM and features the popular K-pop group NCT DREAM. Ticket options range from HKD $799 to VIP packages at HKD $2,499 including VIP seating, a soundcheck party, exclusive merchandise, and a VIP laminate with lanyard. The event requires attendees aged 3 years or above for the seated zones. This concert is part of a global tour with presale registration periods and general sales commencing on July 4, 2025.
enrich_localName: 2025 NCT DREAM 巡迴演唱會 <THE DREAM SHOW 4 : DREAM THE FUTURE> 香港站
enrich_englishName: 2025 NCT DREAM TOUR <THE DREAM SHOW 4 : DREAM THE FUTURE> in HONG KONG
enrich_textEmbedding: The 2025 NCT DREAM TOUR <THE DREAM SHOW 4 : DREAM THE FUTURE> concert in Hong Kong at Kai Tak Stadium on August 30, 2025, features multiple ticket tiers from HKD $799 with VIP options offering exclusive benefits, including soundcheck access and merchandise. The event starts at 6:30 PM and is open to attendees aged 3 and above. As part of NCT DREAM's global tour, this show highlights K-pop entertainment with extensive ticket presales and sales managed through official vendors.
enrich_description: Live 2025 NCT DREAM concert at Kai Tak Stadium with VIP and seated ticket options.
cityline_name: 2025 NCT DREAM TOUR < THE DREAM SHOW 4 : DREAM THE FUTURE > in HONG KONG

source_name: 滙豐160週年滙聚怪招《笨蕉大劇院》
source_address: 香港演藝學院歌劇院, 1/F, 10 Salisbury Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
source_introduction: 滙豐160週年滙聚怪招《笨蕉大劇院》是一齣於2025年8月8日至10月4日期間，在香港演藝學院歌劇院連演50場的舞台劇演出。演出由林海峰、葛民輝、韋羅莎及柯煒林主演，導演鄧偉傑、編劇李偉樂打造。劇情幽默風趣，演員陣容強大，門票價格由港幣$480至$1280不等，另加港幣80元優先訂票手續費。每周二至六晚上8時及星期日下午3時有演出，為觀眾帶來歡笑與娛樂。
enrich_localName: 滙豐160週年滙聚怪招《笨蕉大劇院》
enrich_englishName: HSBC 160th Anniversary Presents: Let Me Entertain You Theatre Show
enrich_textEmbedding: HSBC's 160th Anniversary event features the theatrical comedy 'Let Me Entertain You' running from August to October 2025 at the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts Opera House. Starred by prominent actors Lin Haifeng, Geoffrey Cheung, Verosa, and Ke Weilam, and directed by Tang Weijie with script by Li Weile, this 50-show series delivers engaging comedic performances with ticket prices starting at HKD 480. Shows run from Tuesday to Saturday at 8 PM and Sundays at 3 PM in vibrant Tsim Sha Tsui district.
enrich_description: A lively comedy theatre performance celebrating HSBC’s 160th anniversary in Hong Kong.
cityline_name: 滙豐160週年滙聚怪招《笨蕉大劇院》

source_name: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院話劇《葉甫蓋尼·奧涅金》深圳站
source_address: 寶安區新安街道寶興路深圳濱海藝術中心歌劇廳, 深圳, 廣東省, 中國
source_introduction: 由俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院出品的話劇《葉甫蓋尼·奧涅金》將於2025年9月11日至12日在深圳濱海藝術中心歌劇廳上演。該劇改編自俄羅斯文學巨匠普希金的同名詩體小說，講述了主角奧涅金在厭倦上流社會生活後來到鄉村，與少女塔季揚娜間情感糾葛的故事。此次演出融合經典文學、美術與音樂元素，展現俄羅斯戲劇的高峰，適合文化愛好者及話劇觀眾。
enrich_localName: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院話劇《葉甫蓋尼·奧涅金》深圳站
enrich_englishName: Russian Vakhtangov Theatre Drama 'Eugene Onegin' Shenzhen
enrich_textEmbedding: Russian Vakhtangov Theatre brings its acclaimed drama 'Eugene Onegin' adapted from Pushkin's poetic novel to Shenzhen Binhai Art Center Opera House for performances on September 11-12, 2025. The play explores themes of societal disillusionment and romantic entanglements, blending literature, visual art, and music, showcasing Russian theatrical excellence in China's cultural scene.
enrich_description: Experience the Russian Vakhtangov Theatre's acclaimed drama 'Eugene Onegin' in Shenzhen.
cityline_name: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院話劇《葉甫蓋尼·奧涅金》

source_name: 音樂劇《tick,tick...BOOM! 倒數時刻》深圳站
source_address: 深圳市南山區南山文體中心聚橙劇院大劇院
source_introduction: 英文原版音乐剧《tick,tick...BOOM! 倒數時刻》将于2025年10月2日至8日在深圳南山文体中心聚橙剧院大剧院上演。该剧长约95分钟，无中场休息，适合2周岁以上观众。此次深圳站为大湾区唯一一站，票价区间在180元至780元，现场有高质感的乐队伴奏，呈现追梦音乐旅程。
enrich_localName: 音樂劇《tick,tick...BOOM! 倒數時刻》深圳站
enrich_englishName: Musical 'tick,tick...BOOM!' Shenzhen Show
enrich_textEmbedding: The original English-language musical 'tick,tick...BOOM!' will be performed in Shenzhen from October 2 to 8, 2025, at the Nanshan Cultural and Sports Center Orange Theater. The show runs approximately 95 minutes without intermission, featuring live band accompaniment and representing a unique one-stop big bay area event for musical lovers. Tickets range from 180 to 780 RMB, highlighting a vibrant dream-chasing music journey.
enrich_description: Shenzhen hosts English musical 'tick,tick...BOOM!' live, a vibrant and intimate dream-chasing show.
cityline_name: 音樂劇《tick,tick...BOOM! 倒數時刻》-深圳站

source_name: 2025 翁倩玉 Judy Ongg Thank you for your smile 香港演唱會
source_address: 九龍西九文化區戲曲中心大劇院
source_introduction: Judy Ongg returns to Hong Kong with her "Thank you for your smile" concert, held at the West Kowloon Cultural District's Xiqu Centre Grand Theatre on July 12 & 13, 2025. This event features her timeless classic songs, showcasing her elegant and warm voice. Judy is a legendary singer known for "祈禱", "愛的奉獻", and the theme song of "阿信的故事". She is one of the few華裔 singers to have performed on Japan's NHK Red and White Song Battle.
enrich_localName: 2025 翁倩玉 Judy Ongg Thank you for your smile 香港演唱會
enrich_englishName: 2025 Judy Ongg Thank you for your smile Hong Kong Concert
enrich_textEmbedding: Enjoy Judy Ongg's concert at the Xiqu Centre in West Kowloon, featuring her classic songs. Known for hits like "祈禱" and the theme of "阿信的故事", Judy brings her iconic voice to the stage.
enrich_description: Legendary Judy Ongg's live concert
cityline_name: 2025 翁倩玉 Judy Ongg Thank you for your smile 香港演唱會

source_name: 台階夜幕：《22世紀殺人網絡》 - M+戲院經典放映系列
source_address: 38 Museum Dr, West Kowloon Cultural District, Hong Kong
source_introduction: M+戲院於2025年夏季舉行「台階夜幕」放映系列，主題聚焦奇洛李維斯經典科幻電影《22世紀殺人網絡》（The Matrix），此電影因其賽博龐克風格及深刻探討真實與虛擬的哲學命題而備受讚譽。活動在香港西九文化區M+美術館的M+戲院舉行，免費公開放映，讓觀眾能重溫這部1999年的國際經典科幻巨片及其文化影響。
enrich_localName: 台階夜幕：《22世紀殺人網絡》 - M+戲院經典放映系列
enrich_englishName: Stair in the Dark: The Matrix - M+ Cinema Classic Screening Series
enrich_textEmbedding: The M+ Cinema at West Kowloon Cultural District presents 'Stair in the Dark' summer series featuring Keanu Reeves' classic sci-fi film The Matrix. Celebrated for its cyberpunk style and exploration of reality versus virtuality, this free screening invites audiences to experience the iconic 1999 film in a culturally rich setting.
enrich_description: Free summer screening of Keanu Reeves' The Matrix at M+ Cinema, West Kowloon Cultural District.
cityline_name: 22世紀殺人網絡

source_address: 九龍啟德承啟道38號
enrich_localName: 《Sim信用卡呈獻：TYSON YOSHI THE VILLAIN LIVE IN HONG KONG》| 啟德體育園
enrich_englishName: Sim Credit Card Presents: TYSON YOSHI THE VILLAIN LIVE IN HONG KONG | Kai Tak Sports Park
enrich_textEmbedding: Cantonese hip-hop artist TYSON YOSHI brings The Villain Tour to Hong Kong’s premier Kai Tak Sports Park, a world-class venue in Kowloon. This concert event promises a high-energy live performance, engaging both local and international fans, backed by state-of-the-art production in one of Asia’s most advanced sports and entertainment complexes.
enrich_description: TYSON YOSHI香港演唱會，感受本地歌手現場魅力與大型體育館震撼氛圍。
cityline_name: 《sim Credit Card Presents : TYSON YOSHI THE VILLAIN LIVE IN HONG KONG 》

source_name: 聽見泥土與蒼穹-世界音樂季系列《聲之靈》烏仁娜2025音樂會
source_address: 深圳市光明區光明文化藝術中心, 深圳, 中国
source_introduction: 《聽見泥土與蒼穹-世界音樂季系列《聲之靈》烏仁娜2025音樂會》將於2025年7月5日晚8點在深圳光明文化藝術中心舉行。內蒙古著名歌手及國際藝術家烏仁娜·察哈圖姬攜手三位歐洲著名音樂家，通過草原牧歌與世界音樂的融合，展現跨越語言與疆界的聲音魅力。此次音樂會是世界音樂季“聲起東方”單元的重要篇章，以聲音喚醒觀眾心靈深處的廣闊與寧靜，獲得《衛報》和《Songlines》等媒體高度評價，彰顯音樂的靈性與大地之聲。
enrich_localName: 聽見泥土與蒼穹-世界音樂季系列《聲之靈》烏仁娜2025音樂會
enrich_englishName: Hearing the Earth and Sky - World Music Season Series 'Spirit of Sound' Urna 2025 Concert
enrich_textEmbedding: The 2025 World Music Season concert 'Hearing the Earth and Sky - Spirit of Sound' featuring Urna, a renowned Inner Mongolian singer and international artist, will take place July 5 at Shenzhen Guangming Cultural Arts Center. Urna and European musicians blend pastoral songs with global sounds, evoking cross-cultural harmony and spiritual resonance praised by The Guardian and Songlines magazine.
enrich_description: Experience Urna’s soulful blend of pastoral and world music at Shenzhen’s world music season concert.
cityline_name: 聽見泥土與蒼穹-世界音樂季系列《聲之靈》烏仁娜2025音樂會

source_name: 張碧晨「愛的史詩」2025交響限定演唱會香港站
source_address: 香港大嶼山博覽道1號亞洲國際博覽館
source_introduction: 張碧晨「愛的史詩」2025交響限定演唱會以“愛的史詩”為主題，張碧晨攜手北京交響樂團，透過音樂跨越時空傳遞人類共通情感，打造一場前所未有的交響音樂盛宴。演唱會詮釋愛的多種樣態與豐富情感，融合歌聲與交響編制，呈現沉鬱與炙熱並存的生命韻律，邀請觀眾感受愛的勇氣與力量。
enrich_localName: 張碧晨「愛的史詩」2025交響限定演唱會香港站
enrich_englishName: Zhang Bichen 'Epic of Love' 2025 Symphony Limited Concert Hong Kong
enrich_textEmbedding: Zhang Bichen's 2025 Symphony Limited Concert titled 'Epic of Love' will be held in Hong Kong at the AsiaWorld-Expo. Featuring collaboration with the Beijing Symphony Orchestra, this concert explores diverse expressions of love through symphonic music and vocals, delivering a profound musical experience reflecting human emotions. It stands out for its artistic presentation and orchestral grandeur.
enrich_description: Experience Zhang Bichen's epic symphonic concert blending love and orchestral music in Hong Kong.
cityline_name: 張碧晨「愛的史詩」2025交響限定演唱會香港站

source_name: 伯大尼博物館導賞團
source_address: 香港薄扶林道139號
source_introduction: 伯大尼博物館是一座法定古蹟，位於薄扶林，屬於香港演藝學院的伯大尼校園。博物館提供每月限時開放的導賞團，參觀包括伯大尼劇院、原法國建築的伯大尼小教堂等建築。入場需要網上預約，門票價格為$25，無論年齡。導賞團以粵語進行，約30分鐘，免費享用。導賞團內容包括建築物的重點復修項目，但若有婚禮或活動，相應地點不會開放。
enrich_localName: 伯大尼博物館導賞團
enrich_englishName: Bethanie Museum Guided Tour
enrich_textEmbedding: Explore the historical Bethanie Museum in Hong Kong with a guided tour. This museum, located in Pok Fu Lam, offers a glimpse into Hong Kong's rich cultural past through its architectural landmarks such as the Bethanie Chapel and Bethanie Theatre. The tour, conducted in Cantonese, highlights the restoration efforts and historical significance of these buildings.
enrich_description: Guided tour of historical Bethanie Museum.
cityline_name: 伯大尼博物館 (2025年6月)

source_name: 央華戲劇&莫言劇作《鱷魚》-常州站2025常州中吴文化系列活動
source_address: 江蘇省常州市晉陵北路2號常州大劇院大劇場
source_introduction: 2025年，由趙文瑄、張凱麗、鄧萃雯領銜主演的央華戲劇&莫言劇作《鱷魚》將於常州大劇院大劇場上演。該劇為諾貝爾文學獎得主莫言的原創新作，分為四幕九場，情節圍繞主人公單無憚及其生日派對上收到的賀禮“鱷魚”所展開，透過一條不斷生長的會說話的鱷魚，挖掘人性深處的秘密，深刻探討“欲望”主題。國家藝術基金2025年度大型舞台劇資助項目，為中國大陸重要文化藝術盛事，演出日期為2025年6月28日至6月29日。
enrich_localName: 央華戲劇&莫言劇作《鱷魚》-常州站2025常州中吳文化系列活動
enrich_englishName: Cathay Theatre & Mo Yan’s Play Crocodile - Changzhou Station 2025
enrich_textEmbedding: 由趙文瑄、張凱麗、鄧萃雯主演的央華戲劇&莫言劇作《鱷魚》於2025年6月28日至29日在常州大劇院上演。這是由諾貝爾文學獎得主莫言創作的全新作品，分為四幕九場，圍繞主人公單無憚及其生日時收到的鱷魚禮物，深刻探討人性欲望主題。本劇獲得中國國家藝術基金2025年度大型舞台劇創作資助，是中國內地重要的文化盛事。
enrich_description: 由莫言創作的經典話劇，在常州大劇院上演，探討人性與欲望。
cityline_name: 央華戲劇&莫言劇作《鱷魚》

source_name: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院話劇《萬尼亞舅舅》
source_address: 深圳市寶安區新安街道寶興路1號 深圳濱海藝術中心 歌劇廳
source_introduction: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院的經典話劇《萬尼亞舅舅》將於2025年9月13日至14日在深圳濱海藝術中心歌劇廳演出。該劇由俄羅斯國寶演員謝爾蓋·馬科維茨基主演，曾榮獲2011年俄羅斯戲劇最高獎金面具獎。此次演出是話劇在華南地區的歷史性首演，展現俄羅斯純正經典戲劇藝術，是海內外戲劇愛好者不可錯過的文化盛事。票價涵蓋公益票280元至980元多個檔次，提供優質觀看體驗。
enrich_localName: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院話劇《萬尼亞舅舅》
enrich_englishName: Russian Vakhtangov Theatre Drama 'Uncle Vanya'
enrich_textEmbedding: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院經典話劇《萬尼亞舅舅》將於2025年9月13日至14日在深圳濱海藝術中心歌劇廳上演，由金面具獎獲獎演員謝爾蓋·馬科維茨基主演，這是該劇在華南地區的歷史性首演，為觀眾帶來高水平的俄羅斯經典戲劇體驗，票價從280元起多檔次選擇，適合戲劇愛好者文化參與。
enrich_description: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院經典話劇《萬尼亞舅舅》深圳首演，文化藝術盛事。
cityline_name: 俄羅斯瓦赫坦戈夫劇院話劇《萬尼亞舅舅》

source_name: 親子共賞（藝術科技篇）主題導賞及創意活動
source_address: 西九文化區香港故宮文化博物館故宮學堂（地下低層）
source_introduction: 「親子共賞（藝術科技篇）」是香港故宮文化博物館推出的首個結合藝術科技、展覽導賞與創意活動的親子體驗。活動包括專題展覽「『紋』以載道──故宮博物院沉浸式數字體驗展」及互動導賞和手作創意，旨在讓大人和小朋友在玩樂中學習中國傳統文化。報名參加故宮學堂「夏日『博』學系列」的相關活動，可享「香港故宮之友」家庭會籍限時半價優惠。活動於2025年7月23日舉行，提供上午及下午兩個時段，語言為粵語。
enrich_localName: 親子共賞（藝術科技篇）主題導賞及創意活動
enrich_englishName: Family Tour & Creative Activities: Art & Technology Theme
enrich_textEmbedding: 親子共賞（藝術科技篇）是香港故宮文化博物館於西九文化區舉辦的結合沉浸式數字展覽、互動導賞及創意手作的親子主題活動，旨在促進家庭共享中國傳統文化學習樂趣。活動於2025年7月23日舉行，提供上午及下午兩個時段，參加者可享限時家庭會籍優惠，適合親子家庭體驗藝術與科技融合的教育娛樂。
enrich_description: 親子共賞融合藝術科技與創意活動，教育寓樂於香港故宮文化博物館。
cityline_name: 「親子共賞（藝術科技篇） 」 主題導賞及創意活動

source_name: 【舞是%舞蹈藝術節】廣東現代舞團《燃燒：在漫舞中前行》-深圳站
source_address: 南山文體中心聚橙劇院大劇院, 南山大道, 南山區, 深圳市, 廣東省, 中國
source_introduction: 舞劇《燃燒在漫舞中前行》由廣東現代舞團呈獻，將於2025年7月18日20:00在深圳南山文體中心聚橙劇院大劇院演出。該舞劇融合田徑運動如競走、馬拉松及接力賽跑與城市跑酷及街舞技巧，打造獨特的運動劇場語言。劇目分為三幕: 今天的女性、火焰與少年、並肩A，展現多元肢體元素與當代舞蹈藝術，為觀眾帶來充滿活力與情感的視覺體驗。
source_Categories: 舞蹈,表演藝術,文化活動
enrich_localName: 【舞是%舞蹈藝術節】廣東現代舞團《燃燒：在漫舞中前行》-深圳站
enrich_englishName: Burning: Moving Forward in Dance - Guangdong Modern Dance Troupe Shenzhen Show
enrich_textEmbedding: The Guangdong Modern Dance Troupe presents 'Burning: Moving Forward in Dance' in Shenzhen's Nanshan Cultural Center Orange Theater on July 18, 2025. This contemporary dance performance combines athletics such as racewalking, marathon, and relay racing with urban parkour and street dance to create a unique 'sports theater' language. The three-act drama portrays themes including today's women, flames and youth, and unity, offering a dynamic blend of movement and emotion in dance art.
enrich_description: A dynamic contemporary dance performance blending sport and art at Shenzhen's Nanshan Cultural Center.
cityline_name: 【舞是%舞蹈藝術節】廣東現代舞團《燃燒：在漫舞中前行》-深圳站

source_address: 觀枫街1号, 苏州文化艺术中心大剧院, 苏州, 中国
source_introduction: 《海上鋼琴師——佛羅倫薩管絃室內樂團2025中國巡演·電影主題音樂會》將於2025年7月24日在蘇州文化藝術中心大劇院舉行。音樂會以經典電影《海上鋼琴師》電影原聲音樂為主題，由義大利佛羅倫薩管絃室內樂團現場演奏。觀眾將欣賞到優美動人的電影原聲交響音樂，感受視聽交融的藝術盛宴。票價從80元至480元不等，為一場高品質的文化藝術音樂會。

enrich_textEmbedding: The Legend of 1900 concert by Florence Orchestra Chamber Ensemble features classic soundtrack music from the movie. Held on July 24, 2025 at Suzhou Culture and Arts Center, this event offers a high-quality fusion of film and symphonic music, attracting culture and music enthusiasts with its cinematic themed performance and live orchestral experience in China.

source_name: Park Bo Gum 2025 Fan Meeting - Hong Kong | AsiaWorld-Expo
source_address: 1 Airport Expo Blvd, Chek Lap Kok, Hong Kong
source_introduction: PARK BO GUM 2025 FAN MEETING TOUR [BE WITH YOU] IN HONG KONG brings the beloved Korean actor Park Bo Gum to AsiaWorld-Expo, Hall 10 for a special fan meeting on August 29, 2025. Fans can look forward to an interactive experience featuring engaging stage performances, heartfelt communication, and exclusive fan benefits such as a 1:2 photo with Park Bo Gum, postcard set with a signed postcard, poster, and a Hi-Bye event. The event follows Park Bo Gum's acclaimed roles in dramas like 'Good Boy' and 'When Life Gives You Tangerines'. The tour aims to create meaningful memories and a unique connection with international fans. Tickets are available in different tiers: HKD 1699 (VIP Package), HKD 999, and HKD 799 (All Seated). The VIP package includes a premium reserved seat, professional photo opportunity, and exclusive merchandise.
enrich_localName: Park Bo Gum 2025 Fan Meeting - Hong Kong | 亞博 粉絲見面會
enrich_englishName: Park Bo Gum 2025 Fan Meeting - Hong Kong | BE WITH YOU Tour | AsiaWorld-Expo
enrich_textEmbedding: Park Bo Gum, one of Korea's most beloved actors, will hold his 2025 Fan Meeting 'BE WITH YOU' at AsiaWorld-Expo, Hall 10 in Hong Kong on August 29, 2025. The event features interactive fan sessions, live performances, and exclusive VIP experiences such as photo opportunities and signed merchandise. Fans can meet Park Bo Gum in person and enjoy a memorable evening of entertainment and personal connection. Multiple ticket tiers are available, including a VIP package.
enrich_description: Meet Park Bo Gum live in Hong Kong for interactive fan activities and performances.
cityline_name: PARK BO GUM 2025 FAN MEETING TOUR [BE WITH YOU] IN HONG KONG

source_address: 1 Expo Dr, AsiaWorld-Expo, Hong Kong
source_introduction: SNH48 GROUP第十二屆年度青春盛典暨MEET48.WEB3.0年度全球偶像人氣總決選演唱會，將於2025年8月2日下午3時在香港亞洲國際博覽館Arena舉行。活動集合來自SNH48、GNZ48、BEJ48、CKG48及CGT48五地共超過200名成員，展現多元舞台文化與青春熱血。演唱會特邀國內外知名歌手與明星藝人參與，共同打造國際新紀元的偶像盛典。門票於2025年6月23日中午12時起公開發售，票價由港幣580元起。

enrich_textEmbedding: The 12th Annual Youth Festival of SNH48 GROUP including the MEET48.WEB3.0 global idol popularity finals will be held on August 2, 2025, at Hong Kong AsiaWorld-Expo Arena. source_name: M+戲院夏季節目：台階夜幕：奇洛李維斯「爛片」致敬展
source_address: 西九文化區, 香港
source_introduction: 西九文化區M+戲院於7月至9月期間舉辦夏季節目，其中「台階夜幕」系列向荷李活演員奇洛李維斯致敬，重點放映其早期代表作包括1989年《超時空歷險記》、1991年《終極豪情》及1999年經典作《22世紀殺人網絡》。活動旨在重溫這位國際影星的獨特魅力，以及他在主流與非主流文化中的多元面貌。此外，同場亦會伙拍東盟電影節，免費放映多部東南亞新銳導演作品，並舉辦「前衛正：時光旅人」活動，包括放映、互動式虛擬實境體驗及與當代藝術家對談，呈現當代視覺文化的豐富創意與未來想像。
enrich_localName: 台階夜幕：奇洛李維斯「爛片」致敬展
enrich_englishName: Step by Night: Tribute to Keanu Reeves’ Cult Films
enrich_textEmbedding: M+ Cinema’s Summer Programme at West Kowloon Cultural District presents 'Step by Night', a tribute to Keanu Reeves focusing on his cult films including 1989’s 'Bill & Ted’s Excellent Adventure', and classics such as 'Point Break' and 'The Matrix'. The event explores Reeves’ unique influence across different genres and cultures, alongside screenings of Southeast Asian contemporary films via the ASEAN Film Festival and 'Future Visions: Time Traveller', an immersive VR and art experience with dialogues led by contemporary artists, all aiming to showcase diverse visual culture, creativity, and future imaginations.
enrich_description: Celebrate Keanu Reeves’ cult films and contemporary visual arts at M+ Cinema’s seasonal summer event series.
cityline_name: 超時空歷險記

source_name: M+戲院2025年夏季節目－奇洛李維斯經典作品重溫及東盟電影節
source_address: West Kowloon Cultural District, 38 Austin Rd West, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong
source_introduction: M+戲院於2025年7月至9月期間在香港西九文化區舉辦夏季節目，主題為「台階夜幕」，特別致敬流行文化偶像奇洛李維斯，放映其三部經典代表作品：《22世紀殺人網絡》(1999)、《終極豪情》(1991)及《超時空歷險記》(1989)。節目同時包含東盟電影節，免費展示多部東南亞新生代導演的創意電影，並有互動式虛擬實境體驗與藝術家對談，探索另類現實與未來。
enrich_localName: M+戲院2025年夏季節目－奇洛李維斯經典作品重溫及東盟電影節
enrich_englishName: M+ Cinema Summer Edition 2025 - Keanu Reeves Classic Films Retrospective & ASEAN Film Festival
enrich_textEmbedding: The M+ Cinema at West Kowloon Cultural District hosts its 2025 summer program from July to September, spotlighting Hollywood icon Keanu Reeves with screenings of his classic films including Point Break (1991) and The Matrix (1999). The event also features the ASEAN Film Festival showcasing emerging Southeast Asian filmmakers, plus interactive VR experiences and artist talks about alternative realities and future themes.
enrich_description: Free summer film festival featuring Keanu Reeves classics and Southeast Asian indie films at M+ Cinema.
cityline_name: 終極豪情

source_name: 中年好聲音3 有你有我演唱會

source_introduction: 中年好聲音3 有你有我演唱會將於2025年7月19日在啟德體藝館舉行。演唱會將由八強選手黃博、張與辰、劉洋、李金凱、趙浚承、占士丁丁、陳芷盈和王鄭浚仁出席，並聯同「中年好聲音3 Family」登場。門票分為幾個價位，包括HK$1,380、HK$1,180、HK$980和HK$680等。演唱會於晚上7時30分開始，提前於2025年6月18日在PayKool優先發售，2025年6月20日在Cityline公開發售。

enrich_englishName: The Voice of the Middle-aged 3: You & Me Concert
enrich_textEmbedding: Enjoy the concert 'The Voice of the Middle-aged 3: You & Me' at Kai Tak Sports Park on July 19, 2025. The event features eight strong competitors from the TVB singing program, accompanied by the 'Middle-aged Voice 3 Family'. Ticket prices vary from HK$1,380 to HK$680, with early sales starting on June 18.

source_name: 藝術公園──綠行樹旅
source_address: 西九文化區藝術公園, 九龍, 香港
source_introduction: 「藝術公園──綠行樹旅」是一個結合可持續交通與自然環境的導賞旅程，參加者將乘坐電動車探索西九文化區內的藝術公園，漫步樹木小徑，深入了解樹木在生態系統中的重要角色與生態功能。活動旨在推廣生態保育與綠色出行，提供寓教於樂的戶外體驗。
enrich_localName: 藝術公園──綠行樹旅
enrich_englishName: Art Park – EcoDrive & Tree Dive
enrich_textEmbedding: 藝術公園──綠行樹旅融合了可持續電動車交通和生態導賞，讓參與者在西九文化區藝術公園漫步樹木小徑，了解樹木生態角色，感受都市綠地的自然氛圍與藝術交織的體驗。
enrich_description: 乘電動車探索西九藝術公園，漫步樹木小徑，認識樹木生態角色與可持續交通。
cityline_name: 藝術公園──綠行樹旅

source_name: 香港足球盛會2025 阿仙奴 vs 托特納姆熱刺 | 啟德體育園
source_address: 九龍啟德承啟道38號啟德體育園啟德主場館
source_introduction: 「香港足球盛會2025」匯聚世界四大球會利物浦、AC米蘭、阿仙奴及熱刺於香港啟德主場館獻技。阿仙奴對熱刺（北倫敦打吡）將首次於英國以外地區舉行，吸引全港及亞太區球迷親身觀戰。比賽於2025年7月31日晚上7:30開賽，賽事當日設有多種票價選擇，並於Trip.com及購票通平台發售。此外，報名參加的球迷更可出席各球隊專屬球迷體驗及公開訓練環節，近距離與球星互動。其他相關活動包括熱刺（7月29日）及阿仙奴（7月30日）的公開訓練，地點同樣在啟德體育園。
enrich_localName: 阿仙奴對托特納姆熱刺 – 健絡通盃 | 啟德體育園
enrich_englishName: Arsenal vs Tottenham Hotspur – Kinlok Cup | Kai Tak Sports Park
enrich_textEmbedding: The Arsenal vs Tottenham Hotspur (North London Derby) match, presented as part of the Hong Kong Football Festival 2025, will be the first time this historic English Premier League rivalry is played outside the UK. Taking place at the new Kai Tak Sports Park on July 31, 2025, this high-profile event offers fans the rare chance to witness world-class football in Hong Kong, with additional experiences including pre-match open training sessions with the teams. Ticket prices range from HK$1,299, with premium hospitality options available for an enhanced matchday experience.
enrich_description: Witness Arsenal vs Spurs in the first North London Derby outside the UK at Kai Tak Sports Park.
cityline_name: 阿仙奴 對戰 熱刺 -– 健絡通盃

enrich_englishName: Liverpool FC vs AC Milan – Standard Chartered Cup Kai Tak Exhibition Match 2025
enrich_textEmbedding: The 2025 Hong Kong football showcase features a legendary match between Liverpool FC and AC Milan at the Kai Tak Sports Park Indoor Stadium on July 26, 2025. Ticket prices range from HK$399 to HK$2,499 with dedicated fan zones, allowing football fans in Hong Kong and the Asia-Pacific region an extraordinary opportunity to witness top football clubs live. The event includes public training sessions on July 24 and 25 for an immersive fan experience, organized by TEG Sport with tickets available online.
enrich_description: 2025年利物浦對AC米蘭渣打盃盛事，啟德體育園主場館現場熱血對決。

source_introduction: BABYMETAL, the renowned Japanese heavy metal idol band, will hold their 2025 World Tour concert in Hong Kong on September 30 at the AsiaWorld-Expo Arena. The concert features the trio SU-METAL, MOAMETAL, and MOMOMETAL performing their signature “kawaii metal” style, with hit songs including “Megitsune,” “Gimme Chocolate!!,” and “Akatsuki.” The event promises a dynamic show lasting over 100 minutes, delivering a thrilling live music experience for metal and idol fans alike. Tickets were publicly released on June 17, with various seating options available at AsiaWorld-Expo.

enrich_textEmbedding: BABYMETAL will perform their 2025 World Tour concert at Hong Kong's AsiaWorld-Expo Arena on September 30. Combining heavy metal and idol elements, the trio will deliver an electrifying show including popular tracks like "Megitsune" and "Gimme Chocolate!!" Fans can expect over 100 minutes of high-energy live music, marking a major international concert event in the city.
enrich_description: BABYMETAL brings their iconic kawaii metal world tour to Hong Kong with a high-energy live performance.
cityline_name: BABYMETAL 2025 世界巡迴演唱會香港站

source_name: 英文原版音乐剧《剧院魅影》2025国际巡演中国大陆首站·深圳
source_address: 广东省深圳市宝安区新安街道宝兴路深圳滨海艺术中心歌剧厅
source_introduction: 英文原版音乐剧《剧院魅影》于2025年10月14日至19日在深圳滨海艺术中心歌剧厅上演。该音乐剧为传世经典作品，全球演出超过58个国家，205座城市，超过1.6亿观众观看，曾获70余项戏剧大奖，包括奥利弗奖、托尼奖等。演出时长约155分钟，含中场休息，英文演出配中文字幕，适合1.2米以上观众入场，提供多档票价，部分公益票。
source_Categories: 音乐剧,文化体验,演出活动

enrich_englishName: The Phantom of the Opera 2025 International Tour Mainland China Premiere in Shenzhen
enrich_textEmbedding: 英文原版音乐剧《剧院魅影》2025年国际巡演中国大陆首站在深圳滨海艺术中心举行，全球经典音乐剧传世巨作，震撼回归，为观众带来精彩视听盛宴。演出含中文字幕，时长约155分钟，展现最高剧场艺术水准，深受音乐剧爱好者追捧。
enrich_description: 经典英文原版音乐剧《剧院魅影》2025年深圳滨海艺术中心震撼上演。

source_name: 伯大尼博物館免費導賞團 Bethanie Museum Guided Tour
source_address: 香港薄扶林道139號
source_introduction: 伯大尼博物館位於香港薄扶林道139號，為近150年香港法定古蹟，現為香港演藝學院伯大尼校園的一部分。博物館以免費導賞團形式開放，導賞團約30分鐘，粵語主持，參觀重點包括19世紀末八角形的伯大尼劇院、帶彩色玻璃窗和祭台的小教堂，以及以玻璃幕還原金字屋頂的包玉剛禮堂。入場須於快達票預約門票，票價為$25，憑票可參加免費導賞團。博物館部分區域若舉辦婚禮等活動會暫停參觀。
enrich_localName: 伯大尼博物館免費導賞團
enrich_englishName: Bethanie Museum Free Guided Tour
enrich_textEmbedding: Experience the historical Bethanie Museum in Pok Fu Lam, a nearly 150-year-old Hong Kong declared monument offering a 30-minute free Cantonese guided tour. Highlights include the 19th-century octagonal Bethanie Theatre, the small chapel with stained glass and altar restoration, and the Paul Y. K. Auditorium featuring a glass curtain reproducing the original golden roof. Museum entry requires ticket purchase via online reservation, priced at HK$25, which includes free tour access. The site is part of the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts campus and occasionally restricts areas due to private events.
enrich_description: Explore historical Bethanie Museum with a free guided tour highlighting restored heritage buildings.
cityline_name: 伯大尼博物館 (2025年7月)

source_introduction: BLACKPINK 世界巡迴演唱會 <DEADLINE> 將於 2026 年 1 月 24 日及 25 日晚上 6 時 30 分於香港啟德體育園主場館舉行兩場，帶來韓國人氣女團 BLACKPINK 的精彩現場表演。活動由 LIVE NATION HK 主辦，門票自 BLINK 會員優先購票開始，依次開放信用卡用戶優先購票和公開發售，票價起點約為港幣 680 元。粉絲們將能享受這場國際級音樂盛事，體驗 BLACKPINK 最新巡演曲目與視覺舞台表演。演唱會場館位於土瓜灣九龍區的啟德體育園主場館。

enrich_englishName: BLACKPINK World Tour <DEADLINE> Concert in Hong Kong at Kai Tak Sports Park
enrich_textEmbedding: BLACKPINK's World Tour <DEADLINE> returns to Hong Kong for two spectacular concerts on January 24 and 25, 2026 at the Kai Tak Sports Park Main Arena in To Kwa Wan, Kowloon. This internationally renowned girl group's live show is promoted by LIVE NATION HK, offering fans an unforgettable experience with the latest songs and stage visuals. Ticket sales start with BLINK membership priority followed by credit card holders' early access and public sale, with prices beginning at HK$680.

source_name: 声韵情系戏曲十载情 折子戏专场 | 2025 西九文化区戏曲中心大剧院演唱会
source_address: 香港九龙西九龙文化区戏曲中心大剧院
source_introduction: 《声韵情系戏曲十载情》为庆祝戏曲中心十周年而举办的折子戏专场演出，将于2025年7月27日在西九龙文化区戏曲中心大剧院举办。此次演唱会汇集多位粤剧名伶，呈献多段经典折子戏精选，展示粤剧艺术的声韵与深厚情感，带给观众一场传统戏曲的艺术盛宴。门票于2025年6月10日上午10时开始通过Cityline及戏曲中心票务处公开发售，票价实惠，适合戏曲爱好者及公众体验。现场设有服务费，网上订票收费每张HK$12，电话订票收费每张HK$15。
enrich_localName: 声韵情系戏曲十载情 折子戏专场
enrich_englishName: Ten Years Love to Canto Opera - Selected Scenes Performance
enrich_textEmbedding: Ten Years Love to Canto Opera is a special selected scenes concert celebrating the 10th anniversary of the Xiqu Centre. Held at the West Kowloon Cultural District Xiqu Centre Grand Theatre on July 27, 2025, the event features renowned Cantonese opera artists performing classic excerpts to showcase the rich vocal and emotional heritage of Cantonese opera, offering audiences an authentic traditional opera experience in Hong Kong.
enrich_description: Experience classic Cantonese opera excerpts celebrating 10 years of Xiqu Centre at West Kowloon.
cityline_name: 聲韻情繫戲曲十載情

enrich_textEmbedding: The 2025 BIBI 1st WORLD TOUR [EVE] IN HONG KONG is a major music event featuring the Korean singer-songwriter BIBI performing her hit and new songs on August 3, 2025, at AsiaWorld-Expo Hall 10. source_name: 英國經典舞台劇《Skylight 天色 2025》
source_address: 1 Gloucester Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
source_introduction: 英國劇作家 David Hare 的經典舞台劇《Skylight》榮獲羅蘭士奧利花獎「年度戲劇大獎」及「傑出首度合演大獎」，港版《Skylight 天色 2025》由香港導演司徒慧焯執導，王菀之翻譯劇本及主演，攜手謝君豪與李琛瑜，重現一段揉合矛盾與激情的複雜情感。劇作自2023年首演起口碑載道，場場爆滿，2025年7月於香港演藝學院廖湯慧靄戲劇院強勢回歸，門票現於Cityline公開發售。
enrich_englishName: Skylight 2025
enrich_textEmbedding: 英國經典舞台劇《Skylight 天色 2025》於香港演藝學院演出，導演司徒慧焯與王菀之主演，情感糾葛的舞台劇作品。此劇自2023年首演以來廣受好評，2025年7月強勢回歸香港，吸引劇迷把握難得機會觀賞。
enrich_description: 英國經典舞台劇《Skylight 天色2025》，情感複雜，香港演藝學院上映。

source_name: 茶館劇場「粵・樂・茶韻」
source_address: 香港西九文化區戲曲中心茶館劇場, 西九文化區, 九龍
source_introduction: 「粵・樂・茶韻」是一場由粵劇紅伶羅家英擔任藝術策劃及導演的九十分鐘戲曲入門演出，包括廣東牌子曲、粵劇折子戲、粵曲演唱及粵樂演奏，輔以生動導賞，讓觀眾深入體驗傳統粵劇藝術韻味。節目在布局參考傳統中式茶館風格的西九文化區戲曲中心茶館劇場舉行，觀眾可邊欣賞演出邊品嘗香茶與點心（包括素食選擇）。演出新季度包含經典曲目如《帝女花》〈庵遇〉及《紫釵記》〈劍合釵圓〉等，除此之外更有女將樊梨花題材新折子戲《烽火結奇緣》。演出於每週五晚和週末下午多場，適合親子及文化愛好者。
enrich_localName: 茶館劇場「粵・樂・茶韻」
enrich_englishName: Tea House Theatre 'Cantonese Opera, Music, and Tea Charm'
enrich_textEmbedding: The Tea House Theatre's '粵・樂・茶韻' in West Kowloon offers a 90-minute immersive introduction to Cantonese opera, featuring classical pieces, Cantonese music, and traditional tea with snacks. Directed by renowned artist Law Ka Ying, the show combines selected extracts from famous operas and lively musical performances in a traditional teahouse setting, giving audiences an authentic cultural and sensory experience from July 2025 to March 2026.
enrich_description: Authentic Cantonese opera with tea and snacks in a traditional teahouse setting at West Kowloon.
cityline_name: 粵・樂・茶韻

source_name: Silicon Valley BizWorld Entrepreneurship Summer Camp 香港澳洲國際學校
source_address: Hong Kong Australian International School, Hong Kong
source_introduction: The Silicon Valley BizWorld Entrepreneurship Summer Camp at Hong Kong Australian International School offers children aged 8 to 14 a unique, experiential summer camp focused on entrepreneurship. Participants form teams to plan, fundraise, and run their own startup companies through hands-on activities such as product design, budgeting, marketing, and sales. The program develops leadership, communication, teamwork, critical thinking, and financial literacy, culminating in a fun sales bazaar to showcase their businesses.
enrich_localName: 矽谷 BizWorld 創業夏令營 香港澳洲國際學校
enrich_englishName: Silicon Valley BizWorld Entrepreneurship Summer Camp at Hong Kong Australian International School
enrich_textEmbedding: The Silicon Valley BizWorld Entrepreneurship Summer Camp at Hong Kong Australian International School provides children aged 8-14 an immersive entrepreneurship experience. Teams of students develop and operate their own startup companies through comprehensive hands-on activities that build leadership, teamwork, communication, financial literacy, and critical thinking skills. The camp culminates with a sales bazaar and fosters confidence and a practical understanding of business management in an engaging environment.
enrich_description: Interactive entrepreneurship summer camp for kids to build business and leadership skills.
cityline_name: Silicon Valley BizWorld Entrepreneurship Summer Camp
